formatted_items.content:
I checked both:

1. Gmail – no recent messages that mention HealFast or eligibility updates for this patient.  
2. Notion – the only HealFast‐related note is the general “HealFast Program Eligibility Criteria” page (link below). There aren’t any patient-specific eligibility entries, effective-date notes, or pending-documentation lists there yet.

HealFast Program Eligibility Criteria (Notion):
https://www.notion.so/HealFast-Program-Eligibility-Criteria-2180dc8fa0db81a79213fbf6bc361f32

So, at this point:

• Current eligibility determination: none recorded since the original approval note in the EHR (nothing in Gmail or Notion).  
• Effective date: not yet assigned.  
• Pending docs / next steps: we still need the updated progress notes and PT/OT summary before we can upload the eligibility packet for HealFast.  
• Clinical support notes: the latest relevant information is in Epic under “Progress Notes – Rehab,” dated  — I don’t have a separate copy outside the EHR.

If you need to forward something to Sarah today, you can send her:
– the program-wide eligibility criteria (link above) and  
– an FYI that we’re waiting on PT/OT documentation before finalizing the new eligibility packet.

Let me know if you’d like me to pull a de-identified progress-note excerpt or if you have a different source I should check. I’m happy to follow up as soon as those rehab notes post.

Thanks,  
John
